analyzed: dper na du ba las me dpog pa bzhin no //

analyzed: log @157b pa'i kun rdzob ni rtog pa'i dus na mi gnas pa'i phyir don la slu bar byed pa ste thag pa la sprul bzhin no //

translated: He who, having heard it in one stream of consciousness, teaches it well, is one who has heard the unerring right advice and who performs the action connected with it. He is called one who has heard much.

original: 'di nyid kyi ming ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi ming ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the name of this one?

original: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag go //
analyzed: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag go //
translated: The person is like a jewel.

original: zhes pa ste dper na rin po che'i bum pa lta bu'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ste dper na rin po che'i bum pa lta bu'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of like a precious vase is as follows: just as a precious vase is the cause for the production of all desired objects, so the vajra master is the cause for the production of all desired objects, such as the superknowledges.

original: gzhan go sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan go sla'o //
translated: The other [lines] are easy to understand.

original: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas te //
analyzed: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas te //
translated: Having ascertained the two truths,

original: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden par 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden par 'dus pa'o //
translated: all [phenomena] are included in the ultimate truth and the relative truth.

original: 'dir rgyan bdun yin pas na rgyan bdun no //
analyzed: 'dir rgyan bdun yin pas na rgyan bdun no //
translated: Here, since there are seven ornaments, it is the seven ornaments.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'o //
translated: The perfection stage is accomplished.

original: zhes pa 'di ni zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas pa'o //üîΩbshad smra shin tu rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: zhes pa 'di ni zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas pa'o // bshad smra shin tu rnyed par dka' //
translated: This is from the perspective of the sole union.üîΩThe expounder and the speaker are very difficult to find.

original: zhes pa ste bshad pa po dang smra ba po shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ste bshad pa po dang smra ba po shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the expounder and the speaker are very difficult to find.

original: rnyed par dka' ba ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩrnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan du min //
analyzed: rnyed par dka' ba ci'i phyir zhe na / rnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan du min //
translated: Why are they difficult to find?üîΩIt is said, Not elsewhere than in the yoga tantra.

original: zhes bya ba smos te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kho na las rnyed kyi gzhan las rnyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kho na las rnyed kyi gzhan las rnyed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are found only in the yoga tantra, not found elsewhere.üîΩTherefore, the vajra master

original: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
translated: is the best of all.

original: zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'brel to //
translated: This is related to the preceding.

original: gleng gzhi rim pa sbyor bar bcas //
analyzed: gleng gzhi rim pa sbyor bar bcas //
translated: The introduction is connected with the sequence of the levels.

original: zhes pa ni gleng bslang ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gleng bslang ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is the introduction and so forth.

original: rgyan rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i rigs pa'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud thams cad ni rgyan rnam pa bdun gyi 'ching pa bcings la rgyud shes par 'dod pas kyang de la bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rgyan rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i rigs pa'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud thams cad ni rgyan rnam pa bdun gyi 'ching pa bcings la rgyud shes par 'dod pas kyang de la bslab par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The reason for explaining the seven ornaments is this: all the tantras of all the transcendent lords are bound by the binding of the seven ornaments, and those who wish to know the tantras should train in them.üîΩThis is the meaning.

original: rgyan rnam pa bdun yang yin la bshad pa'i rigs pa yang yin na de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnam pa bdun yang yin la bshad pa'i rigs pa yang yin na de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is the seven ornaments and it is the reason for explaining them, hence it is so called.

original: sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel bshad las rgyan rnam pa bdun spros pa dang bcas pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel bshad las rgyan rnam pa bdun spros pa dang bcas pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the seven ornaments together with their elaboration in the commentary called Illuminating Lamp.

original: // / de ltar rgyan rnam pa bdun go rims bzhin du bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar rgyan rnam pa bdun go rims bzhin du bshad nas /
translated: Having thus explained the seven ornaments in sequence,

original: da ni le'u bcu bdun po nyid kyis bsdus pa'i don bshad par 'dod nas da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gi tshogs gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni le'u bcu bdun po nyid kyis bsdus pa'i don bshad par 'dod nas da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gi tshogs gsungs te /
translated: Now, wishing to explain the meaning summarized by the seventeen chapters, he declares the collection of texts beginning with ‚Äúnow.‚Äù

original: da ni zhes bya ba ni skabs la bab pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: da ni zhes bya ba ni skabs la bab pa'i tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúNow‚Äù is a word indicating the present occasion.

original: @174a * // le'u bcu bdun gyi bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la le'u bcu bdun ni le'u bcu bdun te gzhung gi tshogs kyi rim par phye ba bcu bdun yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: @174a * // le'u bcu bdun gyi bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba la le'u bcu bdun ni le'u bcu bdun te gzhung gi tshogs kyi rim par phye ba bcu bdun yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI will explain the meaning summarized by the seventeen chapters‚Äù means that the seventeen chapters are the seventeen divisions of the collection of texts, and that is what is referred to.

original: le'u bcu bdun zhes pa ni bcu bdun kho na ste 'di dag gis ni mang ba'am nyung ba rnam par bkag pa bstan to //
analyzed: le'u bcu bdun zhes pa ni bcu bdun kho na ste 'di dag gis ni mang ba'am nyung ba rnam par bkag pa bstan to //
translated: ‚ÄúSeventeen chapters‚Äù means just seventeen. These exclude the possibility of more or less.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa ni 'di nyid kyis ston par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa ni 'di nyid kyis ston par 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: Why? Because the path of the GuhyasamƒÅja of all tathƒÅgatas together with its result is taught by just this, not by others.

original: 'on te ma yin na yang lam 'bras bu dang bcas par ston par nam yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te ma yin na yang lam 'bras bu dang bcas par ston par nam yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is not so, then the path with its result would never be taught.

original: 'o na le'u dang po las ni ci zhig gang gi phyir ston zhe na /üîΩle'u dang po las ni zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /üîΩle'u dang po ni thog ma zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'o na le'u dang po las ni ci zhig gang gi phyir ston zhe na / le'u dang po las ni zhes pa la sogs pa smos te / le'u dang po ni thog ma zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Well then, what is taught in the first chapter?üîΩThe first chapter is called the ‚Äúinitial stage.‚Äù

original: thog ma'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: thog ma'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The first is the beginning.üîΩThe meaning of ‚Äúinitial stage‚Äù is the same as ‚Äúbeginning.‚Äù

original: de las ci ston zhe na rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba ni sgra'i tshogs dang don gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: de las ci ston zhe na rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba ni sgra'i tshogs dang don gyi tshogs so //
translated: What is taught in that? The expression and the expressed are the collection of words and the collection of meanings.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyang gang yin zhe na /üîΩbdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes smos te brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid kyang yin la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyang gang yin zhe na / bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes smos te brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid kyang yin la /
translated: What is its nature?üîΩIt is said to be the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po yang yin pas de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po yang yin pas de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is the nature of the expressed and it is also Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is its emanation ma·πá·∏çala?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The thirty-two deities of the Secret Assembly of all the Tathagatas.

original: der nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa ni tshogs kyi gang zag dang slob ma'i gang zag go //
analyzed: der nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa ni tshogs kyi gang zag dang slob ma'i gang zag go //
translated: There, the one who is fortunate to hear is the person of the assembly and the person of the disciple.

original: de la yang ci byed ce na /
analyzed: de la yang ci byed ce na /
translated: What does he do there?

original: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas zhes smos te /
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas zhes smos te /
translated: It is said that he bestows the initiation of knowledge.

original: rig pa'i dbang ni rig pa'i dbang ste /
analyzed: rig pa'i dbang ni rig pa'i dbang ste /
translated: The initiation of knowledge is the initiation of knowledge.

original: slob ma'i rig pa'i dbang ni 'di ltar chu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i rig pa'i dbang ni 'di ltar chu la sogs pa'o //
translated: The initiation of knowledge of the disciple is thus the water and so forth.

original: yang na rig pa dang bcas pa las byung bas rig pa'i dbang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
analyzed: yang na rig pa dang bcas pa las byung bas rig pa'i dbang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
translated: Or else, the initiation of knowledge is the initiation of knowledge that arises from the knowledge of the secret initiation of all the Tathagatas.

original: yang na rig pa'i lha mo dang 'brel bas rig pa'i dbang ste shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
analyzed: yang na rig pa'i lha mo dang 'brel bas rig pa'i dbang ste shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
translated: Or else, the initiation of knowledge is the initiation of knowledge that is connected with the knowledge goddess, the initiation of the wisdom-knowledge.

original: yang na rig pa thob pas na rig pa'i dbang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dbang bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rig pa thob pas na rig pa'i dbang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dbang bzhi pa'o //
translated: Or else, the initiation of knowledge is the initiation of knowledge that is obtained through knowledge, the fourth initiation of the secret of all the Tathagatas.

original: de la dang po'i dbang ni tshogs la sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: de la dang po'i dbang ni tshogs la sbyin pa'o //
translated: The first of these is the gift to the assembly.

original: lhag ma gsum ni slob ma'i gang zag la sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma gsum ni slob ma'i gang zag la sbyin pa'o //
translated: The remaining three are the gift to the individual disciple.

original: dbang byin nas kyang ci byed ce na /
analyzed: dbang byin nas kyang ci byed ce na /
translated: And what is done after the initiation has been given?

original: dbang dang rjes su 'brel ba'i man ngag ston pa ste /
analyzed: dbang dang rjes su 'brel ba'i man ngag ston pa ste /
translated: The instruction in the esoteric science which is connected with the initiation.

original: de'i phyir @174b drang ba dang nges pa'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir @174b drang ba dang nges pa'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚Äúthe interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning, etc.‚Äù

original: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don la brtag pa ni gong du bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don la brtag pa ni gong du bstan pa nyid do //
translated: The investigation of the interpretable meaning and the definitive meaning has been taught above.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so sor ston cing zhes pa ni dbang rnam pa gnyis bskur ba'i gang zag de dang de la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ma 'dres par ston to //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so sor ston cing zhes pa ni dbang rnam pa gnyis bskur ba'i gang zag de dang de la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ma 'dres par ston to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe method of practice of the creation stage and the perfection stage, individually‚Äù means that the method of practice of the creation stage and the perfection stage is taught separately to this or that person who has been initiated into the two kinds of initiation.

original: 'dir gang la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba de dang de la ni bskyed pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'dir gang la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba de dang de la ni bskyed pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar bstan to //
translated: Here, to this or that person to whom the vase initiation has been given, only the creation stage is taught.

original: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i spyod pa spros te ston to //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i spyod pa spros te ston to //
translated: In the secret consecration, the conduct of the secret of all the Ones-Gone-Thus is elaborated and taught.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje bzlas pa dang sems la dmigs pa 'ba' zhig kyang nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje bzlas pa dang sems la dmigs pa 'ba' zhig kyang nye bar bstan to //
translated: Similarly, only the vajra repetition and the mental contemplation are taught.

original: de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yang nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yang nye bar bstan to //
translated: Similarly, the body like an illusion is taught.

original: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gsal ba dang zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gsal ba dang zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nye bar bstan to //
translated: In the wisdom-knowledge consecration, only the clear light and union of all the Ones-Gone-Thus are taught.

original: le'u dang po las de nyid ston nas gzhan dag las kyang ston zhe na /
analyzed: le'u dang po las de nyid ston nas gzhan dag las kyang ston zhe na /
translated: If it is asked why that is taught in the first chapter and also taught in the others,

original: gzhan dag las kyang ston pa bstan pa'i phyir 'og nas bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan dag las kyang ston pa bstan pa'i phyir 'og nas bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: in order to indicate that it is taught in the others, he says ‚Äúexplained below‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'og nas bshad pa ni le 'u gnyis pa la sogs pa ste gong ma ma yin pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa ni le 'u gnyis pa la sogs pa ste gong ma ma yin pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚Äú Explained below‚Äù refers to the second chapter and so forth, which is to say, ‚Äúnot above.‚Äù

original: le'u bcu drug po ni dang po las gzhan pa'i le'u bcu drug po kho na zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: le'u bcu drug po ni dang po las gzhan pa'i le'u bcu drug po kho na zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The sixteen chapters are only the sixteen chapters other than the first.

original: de'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang 'dir rnyed ces sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang 'dir rnyed ces sbyar ro //
translated: The meaning of that is also found here, and the other meanings are also found here, such as the completion stage and subtle meditative stabilization, and so forth.

original: de la yang 'di las gzhan pa zhig yin nam zhe na ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la yang 'di las gzhan pa zhig yin nam zhe na ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is asked whether there is anything other than that, it is not.

original: lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po nyid la 'jug cing zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po nyid la 'jug cing zhes pa smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, ‚Äúone should enter into the two aspects of deity yoga.‚Äù

analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis so //
translated: The two deity yogas are the two, the creation stage and the completion stage.

original: 'di la gang gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yul du byed pa de ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la gang gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yul du byed pa de ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: Here, the one who makes that the object of meditative stabilization is a yogi.

original: rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po 'di nyid kyang gang la shes shing bshad ce na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po 'di nyid kyang gang la shes shing bshad ce na /
translated: If it is asked into what is this very two-fold yoga known and explained,

analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
translated: it is said that it is explained in the Continuation of the Guhyasamaja Tantra.

analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa'i don de nyid gzhan yin no zhe na ma yin pa'i phyir don 'di nyid ces smos te /
translated: If it is thought that the meaning of the GuhyasamƒÅja is different, it is not, and so it is said that this is the very meaning.

original: 'di nyid nye bar ston te gzhan ni ma yin zhes shugs kyis @175a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid nye bar ston te gzhan ni ma yin zhes shugs kyis @175a * //
translated: This very meaning is taught, and not another, is indicated by implication.

original: bstan to // ji skad bstan zhe na /
analyzed: bstan to // ji skad bstan zhe na /
translated: How is it taught?

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa /
translated: The teaching of the Dharma by the Buddhas

original: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i gzhung gi tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i gzhung gi tshogs rnams so //
translated: refers to the collections of scriptures spoken by the TathƒÅgatas, MahƒÅvajradhara, and so forth.

original: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
translated: It is well established in the two stages

original: zhes pa ni de thams cad kyang rim pa gnyis su 'dus zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni de thams cad kyang rim pa gnyis su 'dus zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means that all of that is included in the two stages.

original: rim pa gnyis nyid gang yin zhe na /üîΩbskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang / zhes smos te bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis nyid gang yin zhe na / bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang / zhes smos te bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: What is the nature of the two stages?üîΩThe generation stage

original: gang gis blos bskyed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis blos bskyed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: refers to the generation stage, which is so called because it is generated by the mind.

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni de las skyes pa'i sku'o //
translated: The generation stage is the body that arises from that.

analyzed: yang na bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa'o //

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa'o //
translated: The stage of completion is just the yoga of the subtle.üîΩThis is also stated in the Tantra Requested by SubƒÅhu:

original: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba las gsungs te bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba de gang lags /
analyzed: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba las gsungs te bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba de gang lags /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rten du gyur pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat being, the stage of generation of all tathƒÅgatas is the very basis.‚Äù

original: bcom ldan lhan 'das rten tu gyur pa zhes bya ba de gang lags /

original: bdag gis thos zhes bya bas ni sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
analyzed: bdag gis thos zhes bya bas ni sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
translated: By I have heard, the excellence of the compiler is shown.

original: bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du thos zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis nye bar thos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du thos zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis nye bar thos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: What is meant by heard by me in person is that I heard it directly.

original: 'di skad thos zhes pa 'dis ni ma thos pa dang / gzhan thos pa rnams bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad thos zhes pa 'dis ni ma thos pa dang / gzhan thos pa rnams bsal ba yin no //
translated: By saying thus have I heard, one eliminates what was not heard and what was heard from others.

original: bdag gis thos zhes bya bas ni ma thos pa dang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa dang rtogs pa bsal lo //
analyzed: bdag gis thos zhes bya bas ni ma thos pa dang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa dang rtogs pa bsal lo //
translated: By saying I have heard, one eliminates what was not heard and what was heard by a succession of others.

original: dus gcig na thos zhes pa smos pas ni dus thams cad du thos pa dang thams cad du ma thos pa bsal lo //
analyzed: dus gcig na thos zhes pa smos pas ni dus thams cad du thos pa dang thams cad du ma thos pa bsal lo //
translated: By saying at one time, one eliminates what was heard at all times and what was not heard at all.

original: 'di dag gi sgra'i sbyor ba yang gzhan dag ni ma thos kyi 'di kho na skad thos zhes pa dang / 'ongs pa dang / rtogs pa ni ma yin te bdag gis thos zhes pa dang thams cad du ma thos pa dang thams cad du thos pa ni ma yin gyi dus gcig kho nar de thos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi sgra'i sbyor ba yang gzhan dag ni ma thos kyi 'di kho na skad thos zhes pa dang / 'ongs pa dang / rtogs pa ni ma yin te bdag gis thos zhes pa dang thams cad du ma thos pa dang thams cad du thos pa ni ma yin gyi dus gcig kho nar de thos zhes bya'o //
translated: The application of these terms is as follows: Others did not hear it, but I heard it thus, It was not understood by those who came before or after, but I heard it, and It was not heard at all times or not heard at all, but at one time it was heard.

original: dus phun sum tshogs pa de nyid rgyas par bshad pa dus gcig gi tshe na 'di na 'di thos la gzhan du ni gzhan thos pa'o zhes pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i dus su ni 'di thos kyi /
analyzed: dus phun sum tshogs pa de nyid rgyas par bshad pa dus gcig gi tshe na 'di na 'di thos la gzhan du ni gzhan thos pa'o zhes pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i dus su ni 'di thos kyi /
translated: The best of times is explained in detail: ‚ÄúAt one time, here it is heard, elsewhere it is heard otherwise.‚Äù At the time when the Guhyasamaja was taught by all the Tathagatas, it was heard thus.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i dus su ni gzhan thos she'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i dus su ni gzhan thos she'o //
translated: At the time when the Perfection of Wisdom and so forth were taught, it was heard otherwise.

original: de nyid rnyed dka' bar bstan pa yang /
analyzed: de nyid rnyed dka' bar bstan pa yang /
translated: It is also taught that it is difficult to find:

original: gzhan dag tu ni 'di ma thos pa'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag tu ni 'di ma thos pa'o zhes pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not heard elsewhere.‚Äù

original: gzhan du ni 'di nam yang thos par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni 'di nam yang thos par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It will never be heard elsewhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcu bdun par gsang ba'i snod du ma gyur pa nyid kyis bstan to //
analyzed: bcu bdun par gsang ba'i snod du ma gyur pa nyid kyis bstan to //
translated: It is taught in the seventeenth chapter because it is not a vessel for the secret.

original: blo rno ba ni skad cig ma gcig la'o zhes pas ston to //
analyzed: blo rno ba ni skad cig ma gcig la'o zhes pas ston to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe sharp-minded in one instant‚Äù is taught.

original: skad cig la sogs pas ni yud tsam la sogs pa ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: skad cig la sogs pas ni yud tsam la sogs pa ma yin par bstan to //
translated: By ‚Äúinstant‚Äù and so forth, it is taught that it is not in a short time and so forth.

original: gang las gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'og nas ston te /
analyzed: gang las gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'og nas ston te /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom whom, where‚Äù and so forth is taught below.

original: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ste yon tan chen po dang ldan @182b pa'i ston pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ste yon tan chen po dang ldan @182b pa'i ston pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The teacher is perfect because he is the perfect teacher, who is endowed with great qualities.

original: yon tan gang zhig dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan gang zhig dang ldan zhe na /
translated: With what qualities is he endowed?

original: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: He is endowed with the fortune of the great goal, etc.

original: phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag pa'i don gyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag pa'i don gyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The fortune of the great goal is the possession of the great fortune of the true goal.

original: mdo dag las de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgrib pa ma lus par bcom pa'i phyir skal ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: mdo dag las de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgrib pa ma lus par bcom pa'i phyir skal ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhe'o //
translated: In the sutras, the Tathagata is said to be endowed with the great fortune because he has destroyed all obscurations without exception.

original: gzhan yang gang gis tshogs chen po yongs su bsags pa ni skal ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gis tshogs chen po yongs su bsags pa ni skal ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Moreover, he is endowed with the great fortune because he has accumulated the great collection.

original: skal ba chen po ni thams cad de /
analyzed: skal ba chen po ni thams cad de /
translated: The great fortune is everything.

original: skal ba ma lus pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: skal ba ma lus pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: It is the nature of all fortune.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus par bcom pa ni sa thams cad la sgrib pa yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis spangs pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus par bcom pa ni sa thams cad la sgrib pa yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis spangs pa'o //
translated: The destruction of all resistances is the abandonment of all obscurations on all stages by means of the true intuition.

original: gzhan yang 'di dag gis ni mi slob pa'i zung du 'jug pa bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di dag gis ni mi slob pa'i zung du 'jug pa bstan to //
translated: Moreover, this shows the union of the non-learner.

original: de lta bu'i ston pa des gnas gang du gsungs she na bshad pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ston pa des gnas gang du gsungs she na bshad pa /
translated: In what place did that Teacher teach that?

original: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid de spros pa dang bral zhing rtog pa thams cad las nye bar grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid de spros pa dang bral zhing rtog pa thams cad las nye bar grol ba'o //
translated: Thusness is thusness, free from conceptual elaboration, completely liberated from all conceptualization.

original: der gshegs pa ni de las grol ba ste /üîΩrtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa de nyid mngon sum du gyur pa dang lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: der gshegs pa ni de las grol ba ste / rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa de nyid mngon sum du gyur pa dang lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: To go there is to be liberated from that.üîΩThat very abandonment of all conceptualization is the direct realization, up to the spontaneous.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pa ni spros pa'i mtha' gnyis bsal ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pa ni spros pa'i mtha' gnyis bsal ba ste /
translated: The Thus-Gone is all, eliminating the two extremes of conceptual elaboration.

original: grangs dang grangs can gzhan la thal ba yongs su bsal ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: grangs dang grangs can gzhan la thal ba yongs su bsal ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the elimination of the consequence of other enumerations and enumerators.

original: bdag nyid ces pa ni rang bzhin nam ngo bo nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces pa ni rang bzhin nam ngo bo nyid do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Self means intrinsic nature or essence.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po ni yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po ni yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The essence of body, speech, and mind is called the holder.

original: de'i btsun mo ni des bsten pa ste /
analyzed: de'i btsun mo ni des bsten pa ste /
translated: His queen is his reliance.

original: gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa nyid yongs su gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa nyid yongs su gsal ba'o //
translated: The form of the celestial mansion is the very manifestation.

original: der gnas pa ni de nyid la bsten pa nyid do //
analyzed: der gnas pa ni de nyid la bsten pa nyid do //
translated: Dwelling there is the very reliance on that.

original: de bzhin nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gang gi dus su yongs su snang ba nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gang gi dus su yongs su snang ba nyid de /
translated: At that time, etc.

original: rnam grangs des na ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang du mos pa'i dkyil 'khor dang yongs su bsdu ba'i cho ga dang / rnal 'byor gsum bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis kyang ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang du mos pa'i dkyil 'khor dang yongs su bsdu ba'i cho ga dang / rnal 'byor gsum bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By this enumeration, even future yogins should imagine the celestial mansion as explained, and should meditate on the mandala and the ritual of gathering the components and the three yogas.

original: yi ge'i don ni sgra tsam la gzhol ba'i dbang du byas te 'di'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya ba bshad pa gong ma nyid do //üîΩtshogs la bshad pa yang de nyid de zab mo'i don ma yin @183a * //
analyzed: yi ge'i don ni sgra tsam la gzhol ba'i dbang du byas te 'di'i tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya ba bshad pa gong ma nyid do // tshogs la bshad pa yang de nyid de zab mo'i don ma yin @183a * //
translated: The verbal meaning is in terms of one who is devoted to mere sound. At this time, etc. The explanation of the action is the same as above.üîΩThe explanation of the assembly is also the same.

original: pa nyid do //
analyzed: pa nyid do //
translated: It is not the profound meaning.

original: de bas na bshad pa'i sgra'i dbang du bya ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na bshad pa'i sgra'i dbang du bya ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: Therefore, it is the meaning of the syllables from the perspective of the sound of explanation.

original: bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas te tshogs la bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas te tshogs la bshad pa'o //
translated: From the perspective of the yoga of generation, it is explained in the assembly.

original: gang zhig la gang zhig gis gang du ji ltar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis gang gi spyod yul du gang bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig la gang zhig gis gang du ji ltar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis gang gi spyod yul du gang bstan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because of what is established by whom, where, and how, and by whom, what, and where is taught as the domain of what.

original: gzhan yang gang gis gang zhig gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis gang zhig nyams su len par byed pa dang / gang dang gang gis yul du byas pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gis gang zhig gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis gang zhig nyams su len par byed pa dang / gang dang gang gis yul du byas pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is so called because of what is ascertained by whom, what is practiced by whom, and what is taken as the object by whom.

original: de ni rdzogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: de ni rdzogs pa'i don to //
translated: That is the perfect meaning.

original: gang gis gang gi rnam par bshad pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis gang gi rnam par bshad pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is so called because of what is fully perfected by whom.

original: de nas spyi'i don bshad par 'dod nas smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de nas spyi'i don bshad par 'dod nas smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Then, wishing to explain the general meaning, it is said and so on.

original: gang la gang gis gang du gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang la gang gis gang du gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: What, by whom, where, and for what purpose?

original: sgra'i tshogs 'di yongs su rgol ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra'i tshogs 'di yongs su rgol ba smra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This collection of words will become a source of dispute.

original: gang du zhes pa'i lan du 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang du zhes pa'i lan du 'di lta ste /
translated: In response to where, it is said:

original: yi ge'i don bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: yi ge'i don bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir smras pa /
translated: In this context, where the meaning of the syllables is explained and completed, it is said:

original: dgongs pa gang gis na sdud par byed pas gsung rab kyi mgor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dgongs pa gang gis na sdud par byed pas gsung rab kyi mgor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: By what intention did the compiler say at the beginning of the scriptures and so on?

original: 'di dag gi don yang sdud pa pos gsung rab kyi slad du 'di skad ces bstan pa kho na la dgongs pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di dag gi don yang sdud pa pos gsung rab kyi slad du 'di skad ces bstan pa kho na la dgongs pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur /
translated: What intention could the compiler have had in teaching only this much for the scriptures?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te gsungs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te gsungs /
translated: What did the BhagavƒÅn intend when he spoke?

original: gal te rgyud kyi don mtha' dag bsdus par 'dod pa'am de las gzhan du 'gyur zhes pa rgal ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te rgyud kyi don mtha' dag bsdus par 'dod pa'am de las gzhan du 'gyur zhes pa rgal ba'i don to //
translated: If it is asserted that the meaning of the tantra is completely included, or if it is otherwise, this is the meaning of the objection.

original: de'i lan du gong ma ltar gyur na cir 'gyur zhe na ma nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i lan du gong ma ltar gyur na cir 'gyur zhe na ma nges par 'gyur te /
translated: In response to that, if it were as above, what would happen? It would be uncertain.

original: 'di dag bdag gis she'am /
analyzed: 'di dag bdag gis she'am /
translated: Do I know these?

original: 'di 'am 'di rnams 'di tsam bdag gis thos zhes pas kyang rgyud kyi don ma lus par yongs su rdzogs par ston par 'gyur te der 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di 'am 'di rnams 'di tsam bdag gis thos zhes pas kyang rgyud kyi don ma lus par yongs su rdzogs par ston par 'gyur te der 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, I heard this or these indicates that the meaning of the tantra is completely perfect and complete.

original: gang gis gang zhig gang la nus pa des kyang de'i don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na ni kho na zhes bya ba gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs par 'gyur ba med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gis gang zhig gang la nus pa des kyang de'i don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na ni kho na zhes bya ba gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa rtogs par 'gyur ba med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If someone is able to do something for someone else, then the purpose of that person is completely perfect and complete. The meaning of only is that there is no exclusion of other things to be understood.

original: gang gis gang zhig gang la yongs su ma spangs pa de ni de'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhe na smras pa zhes pa de ni lan ston par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gang gis gang zhig gang la yongs su ma spangs pa de ni de'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhe na smras pa zhes pa de ni lan ston par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: If someone has not completely abandoned something, then that person's activity is completely perfect and complete. The answer to that is as follows:

original: gang yang gang zhig yongs sum spangs pa de ni de'i nyes par 'gyur ba ma @183b yin te de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang yang gang zhig yongs sum spangs pa de ni de'i nyes par 'gyur ba ma @183b yin te de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: That is not a fault of that person. Why is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brdar gyur pa ni rgyud kyi ston pa po thams cad kyi brdar gyur pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brdar gyur pa ni rgyud kyi ston pa po thams cad kyi brdar gyur pa nyid de /
translated: The one who is the sign of all tathƒÅgatas is the sign of all teachers of the tantra.

original: brda gang zhig ston pa'i brda yin zhe na /
analyzed: brda gang zhig ston pa'i brda yin zhe na /
translated: What is the sign that indicates that?

original: shes rab dang thabs ston pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs ston pa nyid do //
translated: It is the indication of wisdom and means.

original: yi ge gnyis su gyur pa 'di kho nas brdar ston par byed kyi gzhan gyis ni nam yang rnyed par 'gyur ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis su gyur pa 'di kho nas brdar ston par byed kyi gzhan gyis ni nam yang rnyed par 'gyur ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the sign is indicated by just these two syllables, and it is never found by any other.

original: gsung rab kyi dang por zhes bya ba ni gang zhig gang gis ston nus pa de'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gsung rab kyi dang por zhes bya ba ni gang zhig gang gis ston nus pa de'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The first of the scriptures means that because it is able to teach by that, it is called that.

original: gang gis de yongs su shes par 'gyur ba des ni de dang de dag yongs su shes par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gis de yongs su shes par 'gyur ba des ni de dang de dag yongs su shes par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that whoever understands that will understand that and that.

original: gzhan yang gang gis de nyid bstan par 'gyur ba de ni de'i gzhung lugs yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gis de nyid bstan par 'gyur ba de ni de'i gzhung lugs yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Moreover, that which teaches that is not the complete system of that. Why is that?

original: sdud pa po med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sdud pa po med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because there would be no compiler.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba 'di sdud pa po'i tshig sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba 'di sdud pa po'i tshig sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: The words thus have I heard would not be the words of the compiler as they are.

original: de lta na sdud pa po med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta na sdud pa po med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the meaning is that there is no compiler.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig 'brel pa med par 'gyur te de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig 'brel pa med par 'gyur te de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What is the point of that? The words ‚Äúby me‚Äù and so forth would be unrelated, because of what?

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni brdar gyur pa nyid yin la bdag gis zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po rang gi ming brjod pas tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni brdar gyur pa nyid yin la bdag gis zhes bya ba ni sdud pa po rang gi ming brjod pas tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the very state of being a conventional expression, and ‚Äúby me‚Äù is a different expression because it mentions the name of the compiler himself.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang la gang zhig yod pa de la de dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gcig gis gcig spangs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: gang la gang zhig yod pa de la de dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gcig gis gcig spangs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Because that which exists in something is absent from that which is mutually exclusive with it.

original: des na sdud pa po med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na sdud pa po med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, there is no compiler.

original: sdud pa po med par thal bar 'grub pa 'di ni thal ba ma yin pa nyid de gsang ba 'dus pa'i don 'dir sdud pa po ni med do //
analyzed: sdud pa po med par thal bar 'grub pa 'di ni thal ba ma yin pa nyid de gsang ba 'dus pa'i don 'dir sdud pa po ni med do //
translated: This consequence that there is no compiler is not a consequence, because in this meaning of the GuhyasamƒÅja, there is no compiler.

original: 'o na zhes bya ba ni mgu ba ma yin pa'i tshig brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na zhes bya ba ni mgu ba ma yin pa'i tshig brjod pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù is an expression of displeasure.

original: btsun pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'jig rten na sdud pa por ci'i phyir grags zhes pa ni lnga sde bzang po la sogs pa gang zhig gis gang zhig yongs su bzung ba dang sdud pa gzigs pa mngon sum dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: btsun pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'jig rten na sdud pa por ci'i phyir grags zhes pa ni lnga sde bzang po la sogs pa gang zhig gis gang zhig yongs su bzung ba dang sdud pa gzigs pa mngon sum dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would contradict direct perception to see that some are held and compiled by some.

original: gang zhig gang gis yongs su 'dri ba med na de yang med par 'gyur bas de rjes su dpag pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis yongs su 'dri ba med na de yang med par 'gyur bas de rjes su dpag pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //

original: zhe 'gras pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhe 'gras pa gang zhe na /

original: sgeg pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sgeg pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is hypocrisy?

analyzed: gang gis 'dod chags kyi yul lam zhe sdang gi yul thob par bya ba dang phrad bar bya ba dang / kun du nyams par bya ba'i phyir tshul 'chos pa'o //
translated: It is a volition which is associated with a thought that is exalted by conceit and which is accompanied by the effect.

original: zhe 'gras pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: zhe 'gras pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is maliciousness?üîΩIt is a volition which is associated with a thought that is not exalted by conceit and which is accompanied by the effect.

original: gang gis gang zhig dang rtsod pa sngon du song ba'am /
analyzed: gang gis gang zhig dang rtsod pa sngon du song ba'am /
translated: What is the point of arguing with someone who has already been refuted?üîΩ

original: phyis 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang bcas te sems shing sems lam dud par 'dzin pas 'khon du 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyis 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang bcas te sems shing sems lam dud par 'dzin pas 'khon du 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: 1. Resentment is the state of mind which, in the past, the present or the future, is the desire to retaliate against someone who has done one wrong, or the desire to do wrong in return.

original: dge ba gang zhe na ma chags pa dang snying rje la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las te gang nyes pa gang zhig dang bral bar 'gyur ro //üîΩtshig gsal ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba gang zhe na ma chags pa dang snying rje la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis bslang ba'i lus dang ngag gi las te gang nyes pa gang zhig dang bral bar 'gyur ro // tshig gsal ba gang zhe na /
translated: 2. Wholesome is the action of body and speech which is produced by a mind of non-attachment, compassion, etc.

original: lce la nyes pa med cing lus yongs su dar bas ched du smras pa'o //
analyzed: lce la nyes pa med cing lus yongs su dar bas ched du smras pa'o //
translated: 3. Clarity is the action of body and speech which is produced by a mind free from the faults of the voice and the body.

original: bden pa gang zhe na dngos po dang mthun pa'i tshig tu brjod pa'o //üîΩmi bden pa gang zhe na /üîΩdngos po dang mi mthun par smra pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa gang zhe na dngos po dang mthun pa'i tshig tu brjod pa'o // mi bden pa gang zhe na / dngos po dang mi mthun par smra pa'o //
translated: 4. Truth is the action of body and speech which is produced by a mind free from deceit and guile.üîΩ5. Untruth is the action of body and speech which is produced by a mind which is deceitful and guileful.

original: nges pa gang zhe na som nyi rnam bar spangs pa'i sems pa dang de'i las so //üîΩnye bar mi len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa gang zhe na som nyi rnam bar spangs pa'i sems pa dang de'i las so //üîΩnye bar mi len pa gang zhe na /
translated: 6. Certainty is the action of body and speech which is produced by a mind free from doubt.üîΩ7. Non-appropriation is the action of body and speech which is produced by a mind free from craving and hatred.

original: dngos po thams cad bdag gir byed par mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad bdag gir byed par mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of the desire to appropriate all things.

original: sbyin pa po gang zhe na gang gis rang gi sdug ba dang mi sdug pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'dzin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa po gang zhe na gang gis rang gi sdug ba dang mi sdug pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing 'dzin pa med pa'o //
translated: What is the giver? It is he who gives up everything, both pleasant and unpleasant, without any attachment.

original: skul ba gang zhe na le lo can dag la kun du spro ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: skul ba gang zhe na le lo can dag la kun du spro ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: What is the encourager? It is he who inspires the lazy.

original: / dpa' pa gang zhe na gang gis gang zhig pham par byed pa dang der sems pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: / dpa' pa gang zhe na gang gis gang zhig pham par byed pa dang der sems pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: What is the hero? It is he who, in the face of danger, is free from fear and anxiety.üîΩWhat is shamelessness? It is the absence of embarrassment about one's own misdeeds.

analyzed: ngo tsha med pa gang zhe na rigs dang chos yongs su spangs te tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i las byed pa'o //
translated: What is deceit?üîΩIt is the desire to make oneself esteemed by others through hypocrisy.

original: sgyu gang zhe na /
analyzed: sgyu gang zhe na /
translated: What is craftiness?

original: gzhan slu pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan slu pa'o //
translated: It is the desire to make oneself esteemed by others through dissimulation.

original: gdug pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gdug pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is harmfulness?

original: nyon mongs pas nyes pa mi brjod pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas nyes pa mi brjod pa'o //
translated: It is the desire to hurt others.üîΩWhat is vanity?
